item.title: Pierre Lévy
item.description: Je suis professeur du Conservatoire national des Arts et Métiers, titulaire de la Chaire design Jean Prouvé, et membre du laboratoire Dicen-IDF (EA 7339). Researching | My main focus is the creation of a Japanese philosophy-inspired design framework to think further the relation between design and appropriation, contributing to Transforming Practices. My inaugural lecture was presented this year. I am also co-organising the seminar Mediums in design with Annie Gentès, CY École de design.
